name: AFL: Quick Match
description:
INTENSE AFL ACTION- The ultimate iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad AFL experience!

Challenge yourself with full competitive matches in AFL Quick Match, brought to you by Tru Blu Entertainment and Wicked Witch Software.


*Supports iPad, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 4th Gen and iPod Touch 3rd Gen.

*Requires iOS Firmware 3.2 or later.


QUICK MATCH
The best way to throw yourself into the action! For a quick fix of some AFL fever, immerse yourself in some fast paced gaming as you battle it out on field!

Realism takes over as you’re propelled into the on-field game play through advanced graphics, animations and sound. You’re on your way to playing your ultimate AFL game!


FULL 3D!
Features full 3D stadium, goals and players with motion captured animations that create impressive and realistic visuals. Combined with stylish camera transitions and smooth effects, you will be catapulted right into the action!



✫FEATURES✫

✔Quick Match Mode
✔3D Game Play
✔Easy to learn, hard to master
✔Goal Scoring
✔Challenging Difficulties
✔Customisable game play options
✔Full Stadium Action
✔Team Tactics
✔Realistic ball physics
✔Lifelike animations
✔Facebook and Twitter integration
